content_email: Our team would like to apologize that the below item in your order is out of stock at the moment and we cannot continue processing the order, unfortunately.In this situation, we have no choice but to cancel the item and issue a refund to you. You can see the refund reflected in your bank account within a few business days, allowing for bank processing times.Weâ€™re thankful for your interest in our product, and if you need any further assistance in the future, do not hesitate to contact us.Best regards,
